name: Healthy Cooking Recipes
follow_up_question: Okay, I'm planning a quick weeknight dinner. Can you suggest a healthy, vegetarian recipe that's super easy to make, and give me the steps in a friendly, bulleted list?
initial_user_prompt: Hey! I'm trying to eat healthier and need some quick vegetarian recipe ideas. Definitely no red meat or dairy, please! And keep the instructions simple and encouraging.

name: Travel Planning (Adventure Focus)
follow_up_question: I'm ready for my next big adventure! Where should I go for some serious thrills, and can you give me a quick, exciting pitch for three places?
initial_user_prompt: I'm all about adventure travel! Think hiking, extreme sports, anything that gets the adrenaline pumping. No lazy beach trips for me. Give me some energetic ideas!

name: Personal Finance Advice (Long-term Investment)
follow_up_question: I'm looking to secure my financial future. Can you explain a long-term, low-risk investment strategy in detail, with a professional tone?
initial_user_prompt: I need some serious advice on long-term, low-risk investments. I'm thinking retirement planning, index funds, that kind of thing. Please be thorough and professional.

name: Creative Writing Prompts (Fantasy Genre)
follow_up_question: I'm stuck on my fantasy novel. Can you give me a few more creative writing prompts, heavy on the magic and mythical creatures, with vivid descriptions?
initial_user_prompt: I'm a fantasy writer looking for some fresh inspiration. Give me some creative prompts involving magic, mythical creatures, and epic quests. Make them really descriptive!

name: Tech Gadget Recommendations (Productivity Focus)

content.dislikes_statement: dislike gaming peripherals or entertainment devices

follow_up_question: I'm looking to upgrade my home office setup. What are three top tech gadgets for boosting productivity, and can you list their main pros and cons?
initial_user_prompt: I'm all about productivity. Can you recommend some tech gadgets that help me get more done? I'm not really into gaming or entertainment tech.

name: Historical Facts (Ancient Civilizations)
follow_up_question: Tell me something fascinating about daily life in ancient Rome, in a storytelling way. I'm curious about their culture!
initial_user_prompt: I love learning about ancient civilizations, especially their daily life and culture. Think Egypt, Rome, Greece. Tell me a story about it, no battles please!

name: Fitness Routines (Bodyweight Strength)
follow_up_question: I need a quick full-body bodyweight workout. Can you give me three exercises with clear, motivating instructions?
initial_user_prompt: I'm looking for some bodyweight strength exercises, full-body routines are great. I don't have any gym equipment, and I'm not really into cardio. Motivate me!

name: Book Recommendations (Classic Literature)
follow_up_question: I'm in the mood for a classic novel with deep character development. Can you suggest one and give me a sophisticated analysis of its main character?
initial_user_prompt: I'm a big fan of classic literature, especially novels from the 19th and early 20th centuries that focus on character development. No modern bestsellers, please. Give me some sophisticated recommendations.

name: Home Decor Ideas (Minimalist Style)
follow_up_question: I want to make my living room more minimalist. Can you give me three practical ideas for achieving a clean, functional look, in bullet points?
initial_user_prompt: I'm looking for minimalist home decor ideas. Think clean lines, neutral colors, and functional pieces. I really dislike clutter and ornate styles. Give me some practical tips.

name: Science Explanations (Astrophysics)

stylistic.tone: accessible, enthusiastic, and slightly awe-inspiring tone

follow_up_question: Explain the concept of dark matter to me like I'm a curious beginner, using an analogy and an enthusiastic tone!
initial_user_prompt: I'm fascinated by astrophysics, especially things like black holes and dark matter. Can you explain some complex concepts to me in an enthusiastic, easy-to-understand way, maybe with an analogy?

name: Language Learning Tips (Spanish)

content.dislikes_statement: dislike grammar drills or rote memorization

follow_up_question: I want to improve my conversational Spanish. Can you give me three practical tips for immersion and practice, in an encouraging tone?
initial_user_prompt: I'm learning Spanish and want to focus on conversational practice and immersion. Give me some encouraging and practical tips, no boring grammar drills please!

name: Gardening Advice (Edible Plants)
follow_up_question: I want to start an organic herb garden. Can you give me step-by-step advice on growing three easy herbs, with a nurturing tone?
initial_user_prompt: I'm getting into gardening, specifically edible plants like vegetables and herbs. I prefer organic methods. No ornamental plants or pesticides, please. Give me some nurturing advice.

name: Music Recommendations (Indie Rock)

content.dislikes_statement: dislike mainstream pop or classic rock

follow_up_question: I'm looking for some new indie rock to discover. Can you recommend three lesser-known bands and give me a cool, intriguing description for each?
initial_user_prompt: I'm really into indie rock, especially the more obscure bands. No mainstream stuff or classic rock. Give me some cool recommendations!

name: Pet Care Advice (Cats)

content.dislikes: harsh training methods or dog-related topics
content.dislikes_statement: dislike harsh training methods or dog-related topics

follow_up_question: My cat seems a bit bored. Can you suggest three ways to enrich her environment, with empathetic and practical advice?
initial_user_prompt: I need some advice on cat care, especially behavior and enrichment. I believe in positive reinforcement. No dog stuff, please. Be gentle and practical.

name: Coding Help (Python Data Analysis)

content.focus: Python code snippets for data analysis
content.dislikes: theoretical computer science or web development
content.dislikes_statement: dislike theoretical computer science or web development

stylistic.tone: clear, concise, and provide runnable code

follow_up_question: I need a Python snippet to quickly analyze a Pandas DataFrame for missing values. Can you give me a clear, runnable example?
initial_user_prompt: I'm working on data analysis in Python, specifically with Pandas and NumPy. I need practical code examples, not theoretical stuff or web dev. Be clear and direct.

name: Philosophy Concepts (Existentialism)

content.dislikes_statement: dislike ancient Greek philosophy or metaphysics

follow_up_question: Explain the concept of absurdism in existentialism and its real-world implications, in a thought-provoking tone.
initial_user_prompt: I'm interested in existentialist philosophy, like absurdism and free will, and how it applies to real life. No ancient Greek stuff, please. Make me think!

name: Photography Tips (Landscape)
follow_up_question: I'm going on a trip and want to capture some stunning landscapes. Can you give me three inspiring tips on composition and lighting?
initial_user_prompt: I'm passionate about landscape photography. Give me some artistic and inspiring tips on composition and lighting. I'm not really into portraits.

name: Environmental Issues (Renewable Energy)

content.dislikes: climate change debates or nuclear energy
content.dislikes_statement: dislike climate change debates or nuclear energy

follow_up_question: Tell me about the practical benefits of solar energy for homes, in an optimistic and informative way.
initial_user_prompt: I'm interested in renewable energy, especially solar and wind. Focus on practical applications and benefits. I want solutions, not debates about climate change.

name: Career Advice (Tech Industry)

content.focus: career advice for the tech industry
content.dislikes: traditional corporate roles or resume writing
content.dislikes_statement: dislike traditional corporate roles or resume writing

follow_up_question: I'm a software developer looking to advance my career. What are three strategic steps I can take for skill development and networking in tech?
initial_user_prompt: I need career advice for the tech industry, specifically software development or data science. Focus on skill development and networking. I'm not looking for resume tips or corporate ladder stuff. Be direct!

name: Gaming Strategies (Strategy Games)

content.focus: strategies for real-time strategy (RTS) or turn-based strategy (TBS) games

follow_up_question: I'm playing a new RTS game. Can you give me a tactical build order strategy for early game dominance, with clear steps?
initial_user_prompt: I'm a big fan of strategy games, especially RTS and TBS. Give me some analytical strategies, focusing on macro-management and build orders. No FPS or RPGs, please. Be tactical!
